ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 53
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all Ok a lot about prices. I tend to advertise when I m in town or answer if someone asks. I sell average (I think) for my server but sometimes will drop if
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all
Ok a lot about prices. I tend to advertise when I'm in town or answer if
someone asks. I sell average (I think) for my server but sometimes will drop
if the customer is the same class. I generally sell bracers for 4 or 5pp up
to tunics at 17pp. The worst I've had is some guy who wanted leggings - he
said I sucked and they were only 10pp in freeport. Guess who got put on
ignore and will never get anything from me. Another I put on ignore would
kept hassling me to come to him to make his stuff. Considering I was hunting
in Guk and he was in Qeynos....

I dont make gorgets. Being around Qeynos everyone has a blackburrow collar
so no point.
10 per mask, 10 per helmet, 5 per bracer, 10 per sleeves, 12 per mantle,
15 per mail, 20 per cloak, 8 per belt, 15 per leggings, 8 per boots.

If those prices are too cheap for my colleagues on Karana I will hapily
raise the, I dont really need money from smithing at the moment but I dont
want to cheapen the market even further

Andric d'Regor - ranger of Surefall
Karana server
